data.title: 2024 Provincetown Drag Shows
data.meta_description: Everything you need to know about drag shows in Provincetown this summer on ptownie.com
data.text:
When: April 27, 2024 to October 26, 2024

The Anita Cocktail Variety Hour is thrilled to be their FOURTH SEASON in the Post Office Cabaret in Provincetown. Hostess and Emcee Anita Cocktail and drag cast members Abby Cummings and Raquel Blake as they welcome guest entertainers from all over the country, performing everything from Spot-On celebrity impersonations, hysterical comedy, Pop Divas, Burlesque and Live Singing. A great way to celebrate a Birthday, anniversary or even a divorce, a night with Anita and the girls is the way to go!

Tickets – $35 – $40

When: May 24, 2024 to August 26, 2024

Get ready to wish upon a drag star! Join NYC’s blonde bombshell Paige Turner in Provincetown this summer for her magical new show THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF DRAG at the Post Office Café and Cabaret! Hop on and take a ride with Paige through her Magic Queendom in this all-LIVE SUNG fantasia celebrating 100 years of DIZNEE! THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF DRAG! is a whole new world of classic songs from all your favorites, like Frozen, Beauty and the Beast, The Little Mermaid, Mary Poppins and more! Be our guest and make all your dreams come true the Happiest Place in P-Town!

Tickets – $35 – $40

When: May 24, 2024 to September 10, 2024

Drag performer Miss Conception Goes To The Movies take you on a cinematic thrill ride through the Gayest Movies of all time in Pilgrim House in Provincetown. From the Wizard of OZ, to Mrs. Doubtfire, Bohemian Rhapsody, Pretty Woman, Pricilla Queen of the Desert, Moulin Rouge and so many more. With 15 Costume changes before your eyes and ALL live vocals, she will leave you with an Oscar award winning performance.

Tickets – $35 – $55

When: May 24, 2024 to September 10, 2024

She’s “Putting the WOOD back in Hollywood!” Tina Burner is back with her all new one woman show “Scene Queen” with the Crown & Anchor in Provincetown! The National Comedy Queen is taking on the Silver Screen, and this friend of Dorthy is dropping more than houses on Hollywood’s elite. From over the rainbow to under the sea, that iceberg is the only thing that’s “straight” ahead. Scene Queen combines live singing, signature mixes, stand-up comedy, and costume reveals! Get your tickets now!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: May 25, 2024 to September 14, 2024

Miss Richfield 1981 “Phony Baloney” in Pilgrim House in Provincetown reminds you that she is genuine, but many things around her are not! Her new show explores how to navigate all things artificial including intelligence, flowers, and mayonnaise. With all new songs and videos, and a healthy heap of audience interaction, the show will leave you appreciating the artificial while keeping a foothold in reality!

Tickets – $35 – $55

When: May 26, 2024 to September 5, 2024

This is a fun and raunchy musical with heart. Grindr Help Desk: The Musical with new audiences in Provincetown at the Post Office Cabaret. It is a one person show about Candice who is an aspiring drag performer but also works at the help desk of the gay dating app Grindr. Featuring original songs, you won’t want to miss Candice’s humor and sass as she helps callers with everything from dating advice to profile pics and more!

Tickets – $35 – $40

When: June 3,2024 to June 24, 2024 in Pilgrim House. July 1 – September 2 in Provincetown Inn

Ryan Landry’s “SHOWGIRLS” is the longest-running show in Provincetown history. It is a talent show where ANYONE can do ANYTHING! But the acts had better be good because they will ALL be competing for $1500 in cash prizes weekly! Ask anyone who has ever been to Provincetown and they will tell you that the ONLY place to be on a Monday night is at “SHOWGIRLS”!

Pilgrim House Tickets – $30 – $100

Provincetown Inn Tickets – $30 – $100

When: June 14, 2024 to September 29, 2024

Sutton Lee Seymour is New York City’s Live Singing Sasshole and she is spreading her comedy and chaos with merriment and madness in her new show, Broadway Barbie at Red Room in Provincetown. When you’re a Barbie Girl living in a Barbie World, there is NO business like SHOW business!

Barbie has had over 180 careers and NOT ONE of those careers has been a Broadway Star… until Sutton Lee Seymour! She is painting the town pink and pounding the pavement, mashing up your favorite Pop Songs and Broadway Show Tunes! Dance the night way with Sutton Lee Seymour and her Dancing Ken Dolls! Nothing has been this CAMP since the Ethel Merman Disco Album (Google it).

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: June 14, 2024 to September 13, 2024

Hey, Ptown, are you ready for a cruel summer? Faster than you can say “Ticketmaster site crash,” Varla Jean has swiftly tailored The Errors Tour for her fans, The Mermies, at the Crown & Anchor in Provincetown. Everyone’s favorite ditzy diva takes you through her catalogue of hilarious hits and egregious errors in a show jam-packed with classic bits, giant wigs, over-taxed costumes, and new songs. This tour-de-farce is certain to be an unforgivable, er…unforgettable evening of “Varla’s Version” of entertainment.

Tickets – $40 – $50

When: June 18, 2024 to September 17, 2024

A live-singing tribute to an icon by an icon! “Thirsty Burlington in CHER 1987” on Tuesday’s at the Crown & Anchor in Provincetown! In a career spanning more than 25 years, Thirsty Burlington is regarded as one of the finest celebrity impersonators. Most notably for transforming into Cher! Come join Thirsty for a fantastical ride of music and comedy!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: June 18, 2024 to September 17, 2024

Enter the world of glamour, grunge, and rock ‘n’ roll as Jizzelle: She Will Rock You! takes the stage at Crown & Anchor in Provincetown a spectacular LIVE concert journey through the decades of Rock. With stunning visuals, jaw-dropping vocals, and a celebration of all things Rock, this Glamazons late-night rock concert transcends time and captivates audiences of all ages. With songs from Queen, Guns N’ Roses, Nirvana and many more!

Tickets – $25 – $35

When: June 19, 2024 to September 18, 2024

“Delta Miles is JUDY GARLAND LIVE!” at the Crown and Anchor in Provincetown promises an unforgettable journey back to the golden age of Hollywood, where audiences can experience the magic of Judy Garland up close and personal. Delta Miles embodies the incomparable Garland with authenticity and passion, delivering a mesmerizing tribute that honors her legendary status. But it’s not just about the hits—Delta Miles infuses the performance with Garland’s spirit, bringing to life the essence of this iconic entertainer.

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: June 26, 2024 to September 8, 2024

JUBILEE: Celebrating 25 Years Of Tammie Brown at Red Room in Provincetown with the first Season RuPaul’s Drag Race! Enter the zany and unpredictable world of Tammie Brown, who celebrates her 25th year performing this year. Let Tammie personally walk you through “Planet Tammie” where exists a journey of live original music, non sequitur thoughts and hysterical musings.

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: June 27, 2024 to September 19, 2024

“Who Run The World” stars Provincetown’s own, Qya Cristál, as she delivers a high-energy power-hour of Pop, Country, Jazz, Gospel, and more at the Crown! Through the lens of the most iconic pop artists of our generation, take a journey through the herstory of independence, courage, and triumph against the odds. With an eclectic mix of tunes from throughout the decades, there’s sure to be a special moment that will connect with you. Join us, as the RENAISSANCE continues!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: June 28, 2024 to September 8, 2024

The Singing Nun? All the way from London we welcome back Sister Mary Playtime at Red Room in Provincetown. Sister Mary was a foundling, discovered on the steps of St Peter’s of the Sisters of the Third Removed, in the heart of London’s West End. It is rumored she is the secret love child of West End Musical Theatre Star, Elaine Paige. Sister Mary loves showtunes and making homemade flapjack. Join Sister Mary as she battles the blues with her unique style of comedy. No pulpit. No psalms. No prayers. She’s not that kind of nun!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: July 4, 2024 to July 7, 2024

A Must-See Show that is utterly delightful, with one of the most talented singers on stage! You’ll love Evita Loca at Red Room in Provincetown and you can even bring your parents, or your kids, without worrying about any shock effect! Gay, Straight, Young or Old, you will love this show!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: July 9, 2024 to July 10, 2024

For the past few years, vocal powerhouses Evita Loca and Sutton Lee Seymour have worked together in New York City (and many other places around the world) at their show “Musical Mondays!” And now they’re bringing their delightful antics and vocal prowess to Red Room for an incredible show full of Broadway belting, high notes, campy comedy in an incredible audience chosen impersonation battle called Diva Shuffle! It’s a show you don’t want to miss!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: July 16, 2024 to July 20, 2024

With almost 30 years under her sequined belt, Sherry Vine has earned the title of Drag Legend with Red Room in Provincetown. Sherry tours the world with her all live singing, hilarious comedy shows, is the star and writer of her own variety show, She’s Living For This (now on Hulu), can be seen in numerous movies and TV shows, is a founding member of Theatre Couture, and is The OG Queen of YouTube, where her video parodies have been viewed over 19,000,000 times. Sherry recently moved to LA where she can be seen as “Blanche” in Golden Girlz Live, Battle of The Bitches (with BFF Jackie Beat) and living the showgirl life.

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: July 18, 2024 to July 26, 2024

Embark on a voyage of laughter, emotion, empowerment and electric performance with “Mama Tits Guts and Glitter,” in Provincetown at Crown & Anchor. Dive into a story of dreams, challenges, and triumphant self-acceptance. Each note and story is carefully curated to carry you through a whirlwind of emotions, from deep introspection to exuberant highs. If you’re seeking an electrifying evening of emotion and empowerment, or simply crave a night of unparalleled entertainment, this is a show you won’t want to miss. Secure your ticket now and witness a performance that’s as touching as it is spectacular!

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: August 12, 2024 to August 13, 2024

Beatrix Eglantine Aurthurson, lauded as the world’s premiere Bea Arthur Impersonator, B.E.A. Arthur Is JUDGING YOU is coming to Provincetown to read you at the Red Room. No, not to read TO you, to read you. Why? Because reading is what? Fundamental. She will also sing songs at you and talk about The Golden Girls, Maude, Mame and maybe even The Star Wars Holiday Special.

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: August 13, 2024 to August 17, 2024

Chelsea Piers is one of the New York drag queens to watch out for at Provincetown’s Red Room that audiences can’t get enough of! Not only does she now know how to slay the game with stunning looks, but she also puts on shows at Baraccuda Lounge in NYC.

Tickets – $35 – $45

When: August 21, 2024 to August 22, 2024

Alaska Thunderfuck 5000 in Provincetown at Live at the Art House. A bizarre cosmic collision propelled Alaska Thunderfuck 5000 to Earth in March 1966… and on to the fifth season of Logo TV’s RuPaul’s Drag Race in January 2013. Still radioactive, no one knows who or what she is yet, but no one cares, as long as she never returns to her native planet. Her age and species remain unknown to the public, but a few of her enemies claim to hold copies of her spawning record and universal passport.

Tickets – $75 – $100
